Text: Willamettensf Real Time Traders I just wanted to pass on the value the RT group is adding to Enron with your help managing Willamettes To date this month Enron has made k as our share of Willamettes sales Thanks for your continued efforts Les

Willamette BOM Sale Rev nsf Per my previous memo Services Desk has a unit contingent sale for the balance of the month to WWP The energy is coming from Willamette and services bought transmission from Pac to move from Willamette busbar to BPA System Then Snohomish transmission to move from Pacs system to WWP system The Pac transmission is Firm and is for mw around the clock so any off peak energy coming out of Willamette can be sold at the Pac system intertie with BPA for no additional charge If there are curtailments dont resupply the schedule Call WWP at then PAC Trans at and Snohomish Trans at to have the counterparties take the schedule to zero For Enpower the deals are as follows WWP Sale Willemette Buy In deal scheduling take the affected hours to zero and note that the unit was out Snohomish Trans Pacificorp Trans In deal scheduling change the delivery point on Pac transmission from Willamette Busbar to show it delivered at MidC This will allow the transmission pieces to be linked together and not cause position manager to be out of balance Since this transmission is take or pay we will be billed for the transmission if we use it or not so leave the volume at Mw My Willamette contact is Doug Reiner his cell phone is his office number is Id like to be called if there are any unit outages or if there are any questions My cell number is home is Les

Willamette BOM Sale Cc Real Time Traders The Services Desk has sold Mw of Willamette Ind energy Balance of the Month to AvistaWWP On Peak beginning through The energy is unit contingent power at the WWP system I have placed copies of the tags and oasis requests in the Services Books I have purchased PacifiCorp Firm transmission to move from the Willamette Busbar to the BPA system interconnect Then Snohomish network transmission to move from PacifiCorps system to Avistas system I have requested that Willamette give Enron a phone number to allow us to communicate Real Time with their generation staff I will pass this along when its received Although the schedule is unit contingent I would like to make a reasonable effort to keep the schedule whole when Willamette has unit problems If we can show that this energy is a reasonably reliable energy source it will open up future opportunities If there are curtailments call Pac Transmission at Snohomish Transmission at and WWP at and inform them of the cut and whatever resupply source that maybe used Feel free to call me at home or on my Cell if there are ever any questions Les Rawson
Re LV Cogennsf Thanks Mark Feel free to call me anytime with questions Les

Wheelabrator Schedule through nsf Forwarded by Lester RawsonPDXECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From PM To cc Subject Wheelabrator Schedule through Here is our schedule for Sunday Monday and Tuesday I have scheduled zero MWhs for the PX dayahead market because we are still daytoday on our fuel supply I will call the realtime scheduling desk to sell probably MW dayof or dayahead If you need to reach me this weekend please call my cell Thanks See attached file Wheelabrator Schedule through xls Wheelabrator Schedule through xls

Enron Bidsresponse to our RFP for generation Les Rawson Forwarded by Lester RawsonPDXECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Le Vine Debi PM To Rawson Lester cc Traweek Nancy Alaywan Ziad Smith Roger Subject Enron Bids Les As you can imagine today was very busy and I apologize that I was unable to return your messages until now The California ISO would like to thank you for your bids from the Las Vegas Cogen and the Harbor Cogen but as we discussed last night the ISO will not be accepting these bids Again thank you for your quick response and we hope that the new market structure will allow you to participate through the markets Debi Le Vine Director of Contracts Compliance California ISO
Lv Cogen Outage DataHeres the Outage information for LV Let me know if there are quesitons Les

Saguaro FERC infoName Saguaro Power Co Unit ID FERC Month Aug Capacity Mw Capacity Out Of Service May NA July hrs Gas explosion July hrs Turbine Wash August NA Total Output for Hrs Mw x hrs additional Mw x hrsAve TOTAL Mw Peak Output Hrs mw x hrs Peak Output less than actual due to unfavorable market conditions prices below costs and temperature limits Let me know if there are additional questions Les

LV Cogen QF agreement Cc Cogen LVC is a MW PURPA Qualifying Facility QF located in North L as Vegas that has a long term QF power sale agreement with Nevada Power Compan y NPC LVCs sale to Nevada is MW HE MaySept and changes to HE and October through April EPMI has agreed to market the excess outpu t during the QF sale hours MW as well as the output during hours when there is no QF sale MW EPMI will generally purchase transmission from NPC from the plant to Mead a nd sell the power to the Px or ISO at Mead LC There are occasions where Me ad congestion has resulted in EPMI purchasing additional wheels from Mead to Palo Verde from APS to get the power into the CAISO Peak hour production is Mw Total daily output Mw Xhrs Let me know if there are additional questions Les

Morrow Power and Frontier Energy Cc PST cwiancsched RT and Services groups Listed above is the Customer Web Interface CWI for reporting schedules with BPA Anytime we run Morrow if it ever becomes reliable BPA wants estimated generation schedules reported using the CWI The procedure goes as follows Go to the Web site listed above Login lrawson Password Joshua Once in look to the upper right hand corner and click on the Ancillary Services Tab In the center of the Ancillary Services page unclick the ONLY SHOW ACCOUNTS WITH DATA tab Then click on the thru thru Select Day buttons If its a real time schedule select When the accounts pull up youll want Account for Morrow estimated Generation and for Frontier Across the top of the page the hours are listed as for HE and HE simply enter the volume you expect the unit to generate and tab to the next box The data should all be green Press the Submit Edit button The data should now be Yellow To refresh the screen press the in the Select Day Buttons the data should now be White which indicates BPA now has it in there Rods accounts Let me know if there are questions Les

SUNDAY ON PEAK LEADING DEALPST REAL TIME TRADERS SPS HAS MANAGED TO OVER SCHEDULE BY MW PER HOUR ON PEAK HOURS SUNDAY AT PV THEIR EDDYPV SWAP WITH EPE Steve at EPE has agreed to a leading deal with SPS where SPSPSCO will supply mw at PV real time to EPE El Paso already has tags out there showing EPE as the source for SPS sales SPSPSCO will supply the energy to El Paso at PV and El Paso should show it going to their system Steve was supposed to let the dispatchers know all the details Les
El PasoPST Ive made a new file for Feburary Its in the same spot PRealtimeepesechedulesFeb See you on Friday Les
El PasoPST Ill be out tomorrow Could you please have one of the schedulers fill in the tag numbers Les

Lotus NotesPST Cara I cant get into Lotus Notes However looking at the scheduling file we quit entering Services schedules in the Lotus notes files early Jan when the CALPX went away and we started doing unit contingent deals instead of Firm All deals are entered under the Services book and all went physical Ill be out next week on vacation Les

Grays Harbor PaperBill NonPrivilegedpst According to BPA we are almost their on Grays The only change is that Enron needs to report the total generator output which as indicated on the prescheduled sheet is Mw One Mw is going to Grays Harbor PUD and we have no responsibility other than to report the total generator output Ive sent to BPA on a prescheduled basis all the prescheduled so that shouldnt be a issue The good news is that on Oct Grays will no longer be our customer and BPA is saying theyll have a automatic system in place to record these numbers automatically by Mid August so hang in there Les

Willamette IndBill NonPrivilegedpst Real Time Traders Willamette has sold Mw on peak FIRM to the LTNW desk This schedule is tagged and scheduled by the Northwest desk Should there be an outage resupply the schedule at MidC and enter a deal showing a sale to Willamette and a buy from the resupply source Services will also be selling Mw of unit contingent energy from Willamette on going If there is an outage on this schedule cut the schedule and call Pac transmission to take the schedule to zero Let me know if there are questions Les

June annuities Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst Samantha Here the annuites for Junes business that need to be posted to the books Frontier to Real Time to Services Desk Willamette to Services Desk Lv Cogen to Services Desk Saguaro to Services Desk Let me know if there are questions Les

Saturday Frontier Energy PaybackBill NonPrivilegedpst Real Time Traders This Saturday Frontier needs to repay BPA for Control Area reserves that where used on and The total Frontier owes is Mw Ive arranged with BPA to return Mw on peak for Saturday However this payback needs to be done Real Time as BPAs ability to take the energy is dependant on their system operations The Real Time procedure is as follows Call the BPA Real Time power scheduler at around or and tell him you are calling to schedule energy imbalance paybacks from Frontier Energy for Mw On Peak If BPA can take the schedule try to get them to commit to take all hours Then call BPA Real Time transmission and buy a Mw wheel using account for Energy Imbalance paybacks to BPA merchant If BPA is unable to take the Mw schedule for any hour please sell it Real Time for the best price in the Northwest In Enpower enter a buy from Frontier at zero price and note in the comments section that this is a energy Imbalance Payback deal Enter a sale to BPA at zero price and note in the comments section that this is a energy Imbalance Payback deal Extend BPA transmission deal to include the additional mw Call me if there are questions or problems We tried to do this payback last Saturday and the energy just went inadvertent for hours because we didnt call BPA Les

BPA preschedulesBill NonPrivilegedpst RT traders Due to a meeting I need help I need real time to call into BPA Frontiers and Grays Harbors schedules The tags have been issued and approved however the account numbers need to be called into BPA The tag for Grays is the tag for Frontier is The account numbers for BPA are hilighted in the Services Book Call around Call me if there are any questions les

FW POWER POINTSGenerators Heres To Better Luck In BrazilBill NonPrivilegedpst Original Message From Foster Chris H Sent Friday July PM To Rawson Lester Subject FW POWER POINTSGenerators Heres To Better Luck In Brazil Original Message From Onukogu Ernest ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESOnukoguCErnestCErnestEOnukogudowjonesEcomE NRONcom Sent Friday July PM To undisclosedrecipientsENRON Subject POWER POINTSGenerators Heres To Better Luck In Brazil NEW YORK Dow JonesLess than a month after the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission shot the messenger its looking for new volunteers On June the FERC totally trashed US wholesale electricity markets with price controls and an order for refunds dating back to October or to May or to whenever they later decide What is the FERC price cap on electricity throughout the western US Well its whatever the California Independent System Operator decides it is Nevertheless on Wednesday the FERC made a sharp Uturn in the direction of free markets for power With unquestioning confidence it ordered all US utilities to consolidate their transmission lines into a few independent transmission operators in order to foster free trade and movement of electricity Surely some might say the FERC didnt give the California ISO total price discretion over the western US did it After all the ISO is simply the administrator of the FERCs very precise formulas like this one for nonemergencies the cost of burning natural gas assuming a power plant is located both in northern California and southern California at the least efficient generator that was called on in the most expensive hour of the most recent Stage emergency that wasnt a Stage at any point during the hour plus for operation and maintenance multiplied by then add if the buyer is the California Department of Water Resources What could be more clear More marketbased as the FERC trumpeted its own ingenuity How could the ISO possibly manipulate that The ISOs initial cap of a megawatthour was based on a gas price of After inputting the other elements that cap turns out to be based on a quite efficient heat rate of Surely the heat rate of the least efficient unit used in the most recent emergency etc was or higher But the ISO decided it didnt want to pay more than MWh Who confirms that the ISO really used the correct heat rate Nobody Now after gas prices crashed to the ISO had full discretion based on a technicality to avoid resetting the cap At all four opportunities the ISO declined to reset the cap because the ISO staff know they cant get the power California needs for which is where the cap would have come out using the old heat rate Thats way below the costs of the marginal generators needed when things get even a little tight Sierra Pacific Resources SRP Nevada Power couldnt get all the power it needed July for even So what is the FERC price cap on western power Whatever the California ISO says it is Not surprisingly Nevada Power and others western utilities are furious with California for successfully using its political muscle to export its problem to the rest of the West Before the FERC price caps the market definitely was working When you had prices of a megawatthour people were mortgaging their restaurants to buy a diesel generator to sell power into the grid said Chelan County Public Utility Districts Chuck Berrie one of a handful of utility veterans in the US who thrived in the deregulated wholesale market Unlike those of most other western utilities Chelans customers havent seen a rate increase and wont for the next five years because Berrie and his coworkers have maximized the utilitys assets and market opportunities People were coming out of the woodwork to get generators on line Ive never seen anything like it But the FERC order killed them Berrie said Orders for hundreds of small dieselfired generators that could have helped get the West through the next months or so were canceled immediately after the FERC order because the generators cost more than MWh to operate They are expensive to run but could have patched over the shortage until big permanent power plants are finished in But who wanted to bet in late June that the California ISO would pass up the opportunity for a price cap So the orders were canceled In fact even with the cap stuck at at least megawatts of installed generators are being taken off line and sent back to the rental companies When the blackouts come hundreds of thousands of homes and businesses will be without power that the generators could have provided The biggest manufacturer of such generators Caterpillar Inc CAT said it is redirecting the units to Brazil which like the western US is highly dependent on hydroelectricity And Brazil like the West is enduring a drought this year Brazil however isnt under FERC jurisdiction But surely the generators must not be needed if we are sending them down to poor old Brazil Not so according to utility employees like Berrie as well as the quasigovernmental Northwest Power Planning Council The chances of blackouts this summer and winter is still much higher than acceptable and of course higher still without those temporary generators Price controls kill the messenger High prices say that supply should be increased and usage reduced Really high prices like those the West has endured for the past year say Hurry But the administration of George W Bush after getting a good ol political whuppin at the hands of California Gov Gray Davis agreed to shoot the messenger Why would anybody get into this industry with all the uncertainty of this ridiculousness Its the price caps as well as the rebates Or youre going to get sued Regular people were practically turning over their couches to get the nickels together to invest in a generator and they have lost their investment Berrie says I think the horse is dead Even if you removed the regulations and prices did come back up people still wont come back What certainty would you have that they wont change the rules again Who can take that risk he added Yet the FERC just ordered the restructuring of many billions of dollars of transmission lines as the foundation of a free market In the East they must be wondering what that messenger said before the FERC shot him Apparently it was Brazils economy can afford to pay more for electricity than the US economy can By Mark Golden Dow Jones Newswires END Dow Jones Newswires GMTAPDJ GMT

Grays HarborMorrow PowerRT Traders As of Oct Grays Harbor Paper is no longer available for merchant sales as they are now under a long term contract with Grays Harbor PUD Over the weekend Morrow Power may call to have the RT group sell hourly between Mws This is a new Gas fired unit located in Boardman Ive put a sheet in the Services book showing the account numbers for transmission Morrow needs to sell at the best price but their costs are between Morrow Power is a valid conterparty in Enpower Feel free to call me if there are any questions Regards Les Rawson

Morrow PowerReal Time Traders Morrow Power wants to take their unit to the market to get some run time before they begin selling Firm energy So Id like the Real Time group to sell the unit at the best price in the hourly market Ive already bought gas for Friday and Saturday operations I expect Sunday to be weak to not run the unit on Sunday I would expect to be back in the market on Monday To sell the unit buy a BPA wheel using the accounts on the scheduling sheet The variable price at the bottom is actual breakeven price To start the unit call PGE at the control room number and give them an hour to get the unit online before you sell It takes minutes to get the unit from cold start to full load and online Also Ive bought reserves from BPA to make these schedules firm for the hour Ill be out this afternoon and tomorrow and Stan will be standing in for me Ill be available on my cell phone for any questions Les
